TypeSignature.Value: .class nested protected auto ansi beforefieldinit HtmlTable/HtmlTableRowControlCollection extends System.Web.UI.ControlCollection

summary.span: 表示作为 控件的行的 对象的集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of objects that are the rows of an control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示的集合对象控件。The class represents a collection of objects for an control. 可以在集合末尾添加控件方法，或位于集合中具有指定的索引位置方法。Controls can be added at the end of the collection with the method, or at a specified index location in the collection with the method. 仅类型的控件可以添加到集合。Only controls of type can be added to the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建自定义可重写方法，以便向表添加行的时，它们将始终添加到表的行集合的开头。The following code example demonstrates how to create a custom that overrides the method so that when rows are added to a table, they are always added at the beginning of the table's row collection. [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection/CS/custom_htmltable_htmltablerowcontrolcollectioncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection/VB/custom_htmltable_htmltablerowcontrolcollectionvb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection/CS/custom_htmltable_htmltablerowcontrolcollection.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection/VB/custom_htmltable_htmltablerowcontrolcollection.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Add(class System.Web.UI.Control child) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Add (child As Control)

span.span: The to add to the collection.

summary.span: 将指定的 对象添加到集合。

span.span: Adds the specified object to the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 添加的控件只能控件的指针; 否则为引发异常。The added control can only be an control; otherwise, an exception is thrown. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建自定义重写的集合方法，以便向表添加行的时，它们将始终添加到表的行集合的开头。The following code example demonstrates how to create a custom collection that overrides the method so that when rows are added to a table, they are always added at the beginning of the table's row collection. 请注意如何自定义方法调用基类的方法替换`index`参数等于 0。Notice how the custom method calls the base class's method with the `index` parameter equal to 0. [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection/CS/custom_htmltable_htmltablerowcontrolcollectioncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection/VB/custom_htmltable_htmltablerowcontrolcollectionvb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection/CS/custom_htmltable_htmltablerowcontrolcollection.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection/VB/custom_htmltable_htmltablerowcontrolcollection.vb#2)]

exception.span: 已添加控件的类型必须为 。

span.span: The added control must be of type .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 添加的控件只能控件的指针; 否则为引发。The added control can only be an control; otherwise, an is thrown.
